BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Gounardes, Addabbo, Bailey, Benjamin, Biaggi, Comrie, Gianaris, Holyman, Jackson, Kavanagh, Krueger, Liu, Montgomery, Myrie, Parker, Persuad, Ramos, Rivera, Salazar, Sanders, Savino, Sepulveda, Serrano, Stavisky, S.4331, and Assembly Members Glick, Cymbrowitz, Arroyo, A.6449, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to photo  speed violation  monitoring systems in school speed zones in the city of New York; to amend chapter 43 of the laws of 2014,  amending  the  vehicle and traffic law, the public officers law and the general municipal law relating  to  photo speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones in the city  of  New  York,  in  relation  to  making  technical corrections  thereto;  and  to  amend chapter 189 of the laws of 2013, amending the vehicle and traffic  law  and  the  public  officers  law relating to establishing in a city with a population of one million or more  a  demonstration program implementing speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones by means of photo devices,  in  relation to the effectiveness thereof”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Photo speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones in NYC (S.4331/ A.6449).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Gounardes, Addabbo, Bailey, Benjamin, Biaggi, Comrie, Gianaris, Holyman, Jackson, Kavanagh, Krueger, Liu, Montgomery, Myrie, Parker, Persuad, Ramos, Rivera, Salazar, Sanders, Savino, Sepulveda, Serrano, Stavisky, S.4331, and Assembly Members Glick, Cymbrowitz, Arroyo, A.6449, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to photo  speed violation  monitoring systems in school speed zones in the city of New York; to amend chapter 43 of the laws of 2014,  amending  the  vehicle and traffic law, the public officers law and the general municipal law relating  to  photo speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones in the city  of  New  York,  in  relation  to  making  technical corrections  thereto;  and  to  amend chapter 189 of the laws of 2013, amending the vehicle and traffic  law  and  the  public  officers  law relating to establishing in a city with a population of one million or more  a  demonstration program implementing speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones by means of photo devices,  in  relation to the effectiveness thereof”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was P-C Item Approved by Comm
Items.MatterName: Photo speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones in NYC (S.4331/ A.6449).

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rosenthal and Gjonaj
